resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit?
Press Ok to proceed to the next step
Please select option before sending your answer.
Please find this item and input a code next to it.

Forests are central to our lives. We eat food and fruits from trees, we use paper from wood pulp, tools with wooden handles, and medicine extracted from tree bark. You have been chosen to raise a forest so as to enjoy these benefits.
Ent is the guardian of the forest, he will help you establish the forest from scratch

This word search game has all the basic terms used in seedbeds.It covers the terms from the seed itself to the creation of a forest.To play the game its quite easy.It requires identification of a word and the clicking the letter shown on the display.The Ent Will help you through.Each correct WORD found will be stored to the RIGHT hand side of the frame.
Across: Natural body of flowing water
Across: A tree species that is popular in Kenya for treating forty ailments
Across: An edible product of some tree species
Across: An ecological role of an organism e.g in a forest
Across: A science of managing and conserving forests and associated resources
Down: A forest is a _____ catchment area
Down: A forest that is found in coastal areas of Kenya and its trees endure salty conditions
Down: A plant organ where food is manufactured
Down: A product of bee keeping
This is the default content view for an activity.

Entiventure game was developed in Chepkoilel University College, department of forestry and wood science. the mission of this game is to promote forestry education in Kenya. At the end of the game, you are expected to have gain knowledge on the benefits of forests. the game is played through giving correct answers to a series of questions, filling out the puzzle and getting facts on forestry issues in Kenya.
Content for the Search page goes here in case the will be need for the search functionality.
Congraturation! You have raised up a great forest.This shows that you have great knowledge in forestry education.Click get prize to collect your reward NOW
Good player! You have made it to raise a small forest.The trees grew slowly because you either did not participate fully or you need a material reference
A trial! You have just started raising the forest.The nursery bed is good for a starter.However,we encourange you to be keen next time.
The effort is not enough!Please we encourage you to gather adequate information concerning forestry.This desert is a great loss to the society.
YOU ARE A PROFESSOR IN FORESTRY
YOU ARE A DOCTOR IN FORESTRY
YOU ARE A MASTER IN FORESTRY
YOU ARE AN ENERGETIC JUNIOR IN FORESTRY
